channel.title: Requesting-Rsc custom items
channel.description: Hey, well as you can see ive been wanting to get to do this but i guess i dont have enough experience that fits the requirements to do it.So i was wondering if someone could make me a Rsc Whip sprite with angles north,south,east,west. Will appreciate it alot if someone could thankyou.

item.title: Requesting-Rsc custom items
item.dc:creator: @xT-e xT-e
item.description:
@xT-e wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:11, topic:271780”][quote author=yong min link=topic=358633.msg2737769#msg2737769 date=1239139513]
Good luck finding someone to sprite for you. There’s not many servers out there that have re-designed or re-created new sprites.
[/quote]

i would do it, its a fun thing to do.
http://s274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/[/quote]

Uhm, this shows evidence of your skill how…?
I’m not having a go, but you have one ‘trimmed’ plate, and that’s just 3 lines over steel/iron.

You need to make approximately 20 images from all angles for an animated object in rsc.
for when it moves and when it’s still, when you look on an angle, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting-Rsc custom items
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

yong min:

Good luck finding someone to sprite for you. There’s not many servers out there that have re-designed or re-created new sprites.

i would do it, its a fun thing to do.

Photobucket

Mario Syrign's Library

View the full album on Photobucket.

item.title: Requesting-Rsc custom items
item.dc:creator: @Argation Argation
item.description:
@Argation wrote:

don’t overreact guys. he only asked a question and a simple yes or no should suffice…

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting-Rsc custom items
item.dc:creator: @xT-e xT-e
item.description:
@xT-e wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:8, topic:271780”][quote author=xT-e link=topic=358633.msg2738059#msg2738059 date=1239150338]
I can do it. I can do any items and the like. Any recolouring, and new item etc.
But because i can doesn’t mean i will.
It’s tedious, and a lot of patience and painstaking time zoomed in at 1x1 pixels.
So if you really want this, place an offer or something.

[/quote]

He’ll probably want you to put them in game for him too, not just the imgs.[/quote]

How about i fully make over of all the character design options while i’m at it? And maybe a 4939489843ft dragon, with venom dripping from its teeth, so it can drop super powered bronze maces.

Read full topic

Im not lazy at all actually i have all the time i need on my hands… and idk seeing i have no knowledge of any of those programs i thought itd be easy for someone to.but guess your just gonna use the excuse im just lazy right.w.e thanks …
